author: Odeinoichus
title: Key chain Droid for fans.
review:
Set #853770 BB-9E Key Chain: LEGO key chains are very versatile, but not very preservable when used as intended. For collectors looking to get certain Minifigures and are willing to remove the key ring they are a great value for the asking price, but as a LEGO item they don't last very long.

Case in point, my BB-9E Key chain has completely lost its entire print. When I first purchased it the print was very nice, quite sharp, an excellent likeness to the droid from the film. After over a year of using it for my key chain the entire print has erased leaving a key chain with a small black plastic ball on the end of it.

It hasn't cracked or broken though, I've heard many regular Minifigures can eventually lose arms and legs due to weathering, cracks and those sorts of things. BB-9E in comparison is the perfect character to make into a key chain. Despite the loss of print it won't break, so your little builders will have fun with using this as a key chain if they don't mind losing the print.

Solid item. Would recommend, but caution that prolonged use as a key chain in your pocket means the minifigure print will fade.

author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Oh my God.......is that darth baul
review:
Opening;

BB-9E key ring is a very good one based of my third favorite star wars film ep8 .

Contense-

The figure was available in kylo rens TIE silencer and the first order star destroyer he is very nice with the head a body printing going great together .

In conclusion-

this is a great key ring      I mean        who doesn't want darth baul , erm,I mean BB-9E .
